entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for April 19, 2024

summary.caption: “Look. Why don’t you just give yourself up quietly? … Otherwise, this thing could turn into a frenzy—and nobody wants that.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for April 19, 2024

summary.caption: Although history has long forgotten them, Lambini & Sons are generally credited with the Sistine Chapel floor.
